verses.text: Nevertheless the dimness \add shall\add* not \add be\add* such as \add was\add* in her vexation , when at the first he lightly afflicted the land of Zebulun and the land of Naphtali , and afterward did more grievously afflict \add her by\add* the way of the sea , beyond Jordan , in Galilee of the nations.\f + \fr 9.1 \ft of the nations: or, populous\f*
The people that walked in darkness have seen a great light : they that dwell in the land of the shadow of death , upon them hath the light shined.

Thou hast multiplied the nation , \add and\add* not increased the joy : they joy before thee according to the joy in harvest , \add and\add* as \add men\add* rejoice when they divide the spoil.\f + \fr 9.3 \ft not: or, to him\f*
For thou hast broken the yoke of his burden , and the staff of his shoulder , the rod of his oppressor , as in the day of Midian.\f + \fr 9.4 \ft For…: or, When thou brakest\f*

For every battle of the warrior \add is\add* with confused noise , and garments rolled in blood ; but \add this\add* shall be with burning \add and\add* fuel of fire.\f + \fr 9.5 \ft For…: or, When the whole battle of the warrior was, etc\f*\f + \fr 9.5 \ft but…: or, and it was, etc\f*\f + \fr 9.5 \ft fuel: Heb. meat\f*

For unto us a child is born , unto us a son is given : and the government shall be upon his shoulder : and his name shall be called Wonderful , Counsellor , The mighty God , The everlasting Father , The Prince of Peace.

Of the increase of \add his\add* government and peace \add there shall be\add* no end , upon the throne of David , and upon his kingdom , to order it, and to establish it with judgment and with justice from henceforth even for ever. The zeal of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts will perform this. \p
¶ The Lord sent a word into Jacob , and it hath lighted upon Israel.
And all the people shall know , \add even\add* Ephraim and the inhabitant of Samaria , that say in the pride and stoutness of heart ,
The bricks are fallen down , but we will build with hewn stones : the sycomores are cut down , but we will change \add them into\add* cedars.
Therefore the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall set up the adversaries of Rezin against him, and join his enemies together ;\f + \fr 9.11 \ft join: Heb. mingle\f*

The Syrians before , and the Philistines behind ; and they shall devour Israel with open mouth. For all this his anger is not turned away , but his hand \add is\add* stretched out still.\f + \fr 9.12 \ft open: Heb. whole\f* \p
¶ For the people turneth not unto him that smiteth them, neither do they seek the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts.
Therefore the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will cut off from Israel head and tail , branch and rush , in one day.
The ancient and honourable , he \add is\add* the head ; and the prophet that teacheth lies , he \add is\add* the tail.

For the leaders of this people cause \add them\add* to err ; and \add they that are\add* led of them \add are\add* destroyed.\f + \fr 9.16 \ft the leaders: or, they that call them blessed\f*\f + \fr 9.16 \ft led of: or, called blessed of\f*\f + \fr 9.16 \ft destroyed: Heb. swallowed up\f*

Therefore the Lord shall have no joy in their young men , neither shall have mercy on their fatherless and widows : for every one \add is\add* an hypocrite and an evildoer , and every mouth speaketh folly. For all this his anger is not turned away , but his hand \add is\add* stretched out still.\f + \fr 9.17 \ft folly: or, villany\f* \p
¶ For wickedness burneth as the fire : it shall devour the briers and thorns , and shall kindle in the thickets of the forest , and they shall mount up \add like\add* the lifting up of smoke.

Through the wrath of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts is the land darkened , and the people shall be as the fuel of the fire : no man shall spare his brother.\f + \fr 9.19 \ft fuel: Heb. meat\f*

And he shall snatch on the right hand , and be hungry ; and he shall eat on the left hand , and they shall not be satisfied : they shall eat every man the flesh of his own arm :\f + \fr 9.20 \ft snatch: Heb cut\f*
Manasseh , Ephraim ; and Ephraim , Manasseh : \add and\add* they together \add shall be\add* against Judah. For all this his anger is not turned away , but his hand \add is\add* stretched out still.
